summary: “I have nothing to prove to you” — Carol Danvers
caption:
“I have nothing to prove to you”
— Carol Danvers

reblog.comment:
“I have nothing to prove to you”
— Carol Danvers

trail.content_raw:
“I have nothing to prove to you”
— Carol Danvers
trail.content:
“I have nothing to prove to you”
— Carol Danvers

body:
Family

Carol x fem!reader

This is my first ever hc ive ever done so please be gentle. Feedback is appreciated tho

• after 4 years of marriage you both decide you are ready to start a family

• it is decided that reader should carry

•That way carol can continue protecting the universe

• you ask tony for help to see if it is possible to have a baby with both of your dna

• it takes a while to come up with something that will make the pregnancy happen

• you start the process

• it is so incredibly difficult at first what with medications and procedures

• carol goes through it all with you

• holding your hand

• stroking your hair

• whispering into your ear how much of a great mom you’re already being

• like everything worth it in life it fails at first

• and it hurts like crazy

• carol is always the strong one

• making sure that you have everything

• been positive even when she is also hurting on the inside

• you notice so you make arrangements with thor so he can spar with carol so she can release the anger and sadness in a safe way

• during your eighth try to tell carol you want to stop

• “you dont want a kid anymore?” She ask

• “ I will always want a baby with you carol, but i need a break at least for a lil while.” You tell her as you lay on the medical bed

• she nods as her eyes fills with tears “ok sweetheart we can do that”

• after 3 months Carol hasnt heard anything yet

• she has been on a mission for the last 2 weeks she remembers saying goodbye to you

• “I’ll be home as soon as possible ok?” She says as she cradles your head to her chest

• “ I know, I just wish it was at least after the test results” you say as you look up to her face

“I dont want to do this alone”

• “you wont do this alone, if you want I can ask Maria to come and be with you."  She says a small smile on her face

• "No its ok, im sure tony is going to be around with morgan like always.” You laugh thinking about Tony’s and Morgan’s relationship how sassy they both are and how a great father-daughter relationship they have.

• “Carol?"  She turns to find thor "we’re here”

• “I’ll be right over” with one more mental image of you she steels herself ready to get this over with to get back to you

• its been a long battle and now the enemies reinforcements arrived carol is exhausted ready to tell the others to retreat

• when all of a sudden she’s receiving an incoming message.

• “I’m a bit busy Friday” she heaves out of exhaustion

• “ ma'am its from Y/N”

• as soon as she hears your name she tells friday to open it

• in seconds a single image appears in front of her brown eyes

• there clear as day a pregnancy test the result..

• positive

• you had done it you were going to be parents

• Carol Danvers was going to be a mom

• with that she gets a huge surge of energy back to her

• and with that she takes out every single ship hovering above

• with the knowledge that she is going to go back to her family

Will be doing a part 2 hopefully

summary: peak ally activity was when me and my cishet friend went to see captain marvel together and she immediately assumed carol and...
body: peak ally activity was when me and my cishet friend went to see captain marvel together and she immediately assumed carol and maria were together and upon being informed by me, a fully fledged gay, that marvel hadn’t intended it to seem like that, declared something along the lines of “marvel SUCKS”

summary: Okay, guys so we know that in the soul stone, no one can actually recall what actually happened in there or if they were...
body:
Okay, guys so we know that in the soul stone, no one can actually recall what actually happened in there or if they were actually just dead or whatever, but I have this really stupid head canon that one day Peter makes a video called ‘My Life in the Soul Stone’ and uploads it to YouTube. Obviously, Shuri catches on and makes her own version, ‘A Princesses Experience in the Soul Stone’.

Both of these video’s go viral. People who were dusted start getting in on it, making their own versions of the video. Dusted people start making group chats to start making inside jokes and terrible memes that ‘happened in the Soul Stone’.

No one who got dusted calls anyone out. They all laugh at the terrible memes and talk about how ‘relatable’ it is.

Then non dusted people start making theories about if it’s real or not, so someone makes a font for the ‘Soul Stone’ escapees. It quickly spreads through group chats and they start using it to ‘communicate’ to each other. It becomes a ‘culture’ of people on the internet and people who weren’t there ‘just wouldn’t understand it’, when in reality, it’s half of the earths population trolling the other half purely because they can.

summary: People love cocky male superheroes (and characters in general) without question. Like they just take it as a charming, if...
body:
People love cocky male superheroes (and characters in general) without question. Like they just take it as a charming, if occasionally endearingly annoying, trait. They don’t question whether they’ve earned the right to be cocky or confident or not. It’s just accepted as a male trait.

Then you have a female superhero/character like Carol Danvers, who HAS EARNED the right to be confident a thousand times over in her life. She carries herself with the cockiness and swagger of someone who has achieved greatness in everything she’s ever set her mind to. Yeah, she’s been told no A LOT. She’s fallen down so many times but she always gets up. And her first impulse is always to help people without considering how it would reflect on her. She makes fun of herself as much as she pokes fun at anyone else. She knows her worth, and it took her a while to get there… to know that she had to do things her own way because the world didn’t want to see her succeed. But she succeeded anyway by learning how to trust in herself. So yeah, Carol is cocky and she deserves to be because she’s EARNED IT. And even if she hadn’t, would you question the cockiness of a male character in the same position? It reminds me of people calling Rey a Mary Sue despite the fact that there is loads of canon evidence to back up WHY she is so good at so many things. (Plus all it really takes is some critical thinking when you realize the girl had to learn these things in order to SURVIVE ON HER OWN ON A DESERT PLANET FOR OVER A DECADE!) Yet no one ever calls Anakin a Mary Sue. I mean, all of this might not be an issue if so many of you would stop being “fake fans” and read the additional canon material that expands upon the characters but noooo. ;)

summary:
Stop the dc and marvel war
I'm sick and tired of people saying 'captain marvel could totally kick wonder woman's ass' or...
body:
Stop the dc and marvel war

I’m sick and tired of people saying ‘captain marvel could totally kick wonder woman’s ass’ or something,why can’t we all think about how instead of fighting Captain marvel and wonder woman and thor would discover/rediscover earth foods and Bruce and Tony would probably show each other pictures of and talk about all of their adopted children.

Hi, I'm Nel. I'm a chinese-sundanese-javanese Indonesian with German ancestors whose heart was left in New York. 
I love cats. And I talk to my plants. 
Partial photographer and a cook, but just basically a gamer girl.
#CaptainMarvel 🌈

blog.name: p-parkerz
blog.title: And Back To Being A Spidey Stan

tags: mostly related to her heat powers but
summary: Things that Carol’s powers help with that don’t have to do with saving the world
body:
Things that Carol’s powers help with that don’t have to do with saving the world

  • Heat water (including swimming pools)
  • Jumpstart cars
  • Charge cars/computers/phones/ etc.
  • Get things off of high shelves
  • Put on a spectacular fireworks show
  • Dry off fast
  • C R O P C I R C L E S
  • Probably can cook a raw chicken with the slap of her hand
  • Welding
  • Taking Monica on flights
  • Starting a fire

summary: I need more of Carol being taken care of. She gets sick or hurt and she needs to be taken care of but is a horrible patient....
question: I need more of Carol being taken care of. She gets sick or hurt and she needs to be taken care of but is a horrible patient. Maybe she gets hurt saving someone and being all heroic before she was a superhero and all.
answer:
Hi anon! Thanks for the prompt! i’m not entirely happy with this, but I hope you will like it :)

Carol x Maria, Captain Marvel; on AO3

.

They’re

sitting at the kitchen table and the emergency kit Maria always keeps around

has seen better days – they both use it much more than she would like.

“Ouch!”

Carol yelps in surprise. “I didn’t think it would sting that much”.

“Yes

well, you did fight a guy twice your size” is the snarky reply she gets for her

suffering.

“That

asshole called one of his buddy to overpower me”, she grumbles, flinching away

when Maria reaches out to disinfect her wound.

“Yes

I know love, but you gotta hold still. Wouldn’t want the mighty Avenger to die

from infection, would we?”

But

Carol won’t – probably doesn’t even know

how to – stay still. Maria would gladly let her go if Carol hadn’t several deep

cuts on her face that definitely need

to be tended to.

“Not

much of an avenger when I get beaten up” Carol answers bitterly, looking down –

once again moving her head.

Maria

has had enough, and catches Carol’s chin to keep her in place.

But

in doing so, her thumb lands right besides Carol’s lips, and they both stop

moving to stare at each other. She should move, she knows, but all she wants to

do is to caress those lips that have been tempting her for months. All she

wants to do is kiss Carol. She wishes

Carol would lean in, kiss her palm, kiss her.

She

manages to break the spell - breaking eye contact, and puts some more

disinfectant on the cotton she uses to dab Carol’s cuts. She thinks back to

what she wanted to say before having a mini-meltdown while staring into her

best-friend’s eyes.

She

continues cleaning the cuts.

“Carol,

I appreciate what you were trying to do, but don’t do that again. Ever.

Please.”

“But-“

“People

are going to talk. You’re only giving them more reason to talk when you punch

them.”

“So

I’m just supposed to let them talk?!”

“Carol,

I’m a black woman in America. I’ve been called way worse than that. In the army

and elsewhere.”

Carol

catches her hand, the one still holding Carol’s jaw, keeping it in place. “It’s

not fair.”

Maria

sighs. “Carol, do you remember what the doctor told us about stress during the

pregnancy?”

The

blonde looks at her questioningly. “To avoid it as much as possible, why?”

“I

have enough stress sources in my life as it is. Please don’t make me worry.” So

yes, she’s not above using the pregnancy card but she’s not sure how she would

handle it if Carol got seriously hurt, pregnancy or not.

Carol

lowers her head in defeat.

“Fine,

if you don’t want me to punch people who insult you, I won’t.”

“Good.”

She appreciates the gesture, truly, but she won’t let Carol get into even more

trouble because she feels she has a duty to protect her.

“But

I will give them the meanest stink-eye they’ve ever seen”.

She

bursts out laughing. That woman will be the end of her.

“As

long as there’s no punching, do what you want Danvers”.

She

regrets that phrasing the second she says it, because Carol suddenly has a

mischievous look in her eyes.

“Does

that mean that I can kick them?” the smartass asks with a smirk.

Maria

presses a bit too much on the cut

over Carol’s eyebrow. “Oow, what was that for?!”

“For

being a pain in my ass.”

“You

love me anyway”. That’s the whole problem isn’t it? The blonde even has the nerve to look at her with her sweet,

loving – even if deeply amused – eyes.

“Yeah.

I do.”

summary: Star Wars Ahsoka Tano Actress Ashley Eckstein Claims Brie Larson Lives The Part of Captain Marvel Both On and Off Screen
title: Star Wars Ahsoka Tano Actress Ashley Eckstein Claims Brie Larson Lives The Part of Captain Marvel Both On and Off Screen
body:
Star Wars Ahsoka Tano Actress Ashley Eckstein Claims Brie Larson Lives The Part of Captain Marvel Both On and Off Screen

Star Wars voice actress Ashley Eckstein, who voiced Ahsoka Tano in Star Wars: The Clone Wars, detailed her first encounter with Captain Marvel actress Brie Larson noting she “lives the part both on and off the screen.”

Eckstein took to Instagram after she encountered Brie Larson at Oga’s Cantina during the opening of Disney’s Star Wars: Galaxy’s Edge which is located within Disneyland Resort in…

View On WordPress
